title: Changelog
author: mason
summary: Added a changelog tool to the site. It's the page you're currently on!

title: Updates to Hexa tool
author: mason
summary: Fixed some broken m3/m4 images, added Sia Astelle (kind of!), Len, and Ascent Skills
detailsHtml:
What Changed

  • Sia Astelle: Added to the list of available classes for the current skills she has. I don't really know all the nuances of Erda Link and I am too lazy to create a custom solution for her ðŸ’€
  • Ren/Len: Added to the list of available classes. Will likely need to change many of the names when they get localized to GMS.
  • General: Ascent skills for all classes have been added. This may need to be localized as well. For classes without an ascent skill (non-KMS classes), the space where it would appear will be blank.

Fixes:

  • There were a few broken M3/M4 images that I never noticed - these are now fixed.
  • The origin upgrade cost table was wrong and over-counting Sol Erda (not fragments) for the level 1 -> 2 upgrade.

title: Updates and improvements to Bosses info
author: mason
summary: Improved styling (mostly for light-mode) for the bosses page
detailsHtml:
What Changed

  • Boss cards with a lot of difficulties should now have better responsiveness instead of overflowing
  • Boss cards per row changed from 5 at max to 4
  • Added accent colours in line with other parts of the site
  • Fixed a lot of ugly things on light mode
  • Added Baldrix data. Image unavailable until it becomes available in the files.

title: Additions and fixes to Liberation calculator
author: mason
summary: Fixed an edge case with monthly traces, added schedule timeline, added Destiny liberation
detailsHtml:
What Changed

  • Fixed an oversight causing the calculator to incorrectly miss BM runs in certain cases.
  • Added a "Schedule Timeline" section to the calculator that breaks down your weekly/monthly trace acquisition.
  • Added a new tab to the calculator for Destiny Liberation.

title: Updates to Hexa tool
author: mason
summary: Added M3/M4 for Kanna, Lynn, Hayato, and Mo Xuan

title: Updates and improvements to Bosses info
author: mason
detailsHtml:
What Changed

  • The styling is a little less ugly!
  • Added a search bar
  • Separated the "AF/SAC" tab into AF and SAC depending on the boss
  • Added hover tooltips for AF/SAC damage increase breakpoints
  • Added HP segmenting for bosses with segments
  • Added local storage saving for difficulties to persist on future visits/refreshes

title: Liberation Calculator
author: mason
summary: Added a tool for planning your liberation timeline
detailsHtml:
Overview

  • This tool is heavily inspired by MapleRoad's Liberation Calculator.
  • Allows the user to see when they will liberate based on the bosses they will be clearing and their start date.

Link

  • Check out the tool /liberation

title: Cash Shop item fixes
author: mason
summary: Fixed an issue caused by Nexon adding new worlds
detailsHtml:
What Changed

  • Item tooltips for Cash Shop sales were parsing which world the item was sold in incorrectly, since Nexon added new world IDs and broke my parsing.
